summary:
The Argonian female specular map fix
is finally here
descriptionHtml:
The Argonian female specular map fix is finally here or just call it AFSMF its way easier :P
When i made the Male version i said to myself "yo' you have to fix the female version also, because if not people will just request it", so didnt do it.
AND I was right, it got request by nexus user [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/9642006]edification[/url] so i jumped back into photoshop and here it is :D

For people who doesnt have the male version

This fixer, fixes the weird plastic coating or wet effect on the female argonian race.
She will still have glossy/shiny parts, but now it just looks better :)

IMPORTANT!
This file is ONLY for vanilla body

Also if you want please upload some pictures of your character :)
Keep in mind that the pictures i have uploaded are with ELEFX and Real vision enb combined with skylight enb!

Also try out my other mods

AMSMF (A Must have if you download the female version)
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73089/?

HD Argonian Scars (both female and male
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73215/?

HD Argonian Mouth 
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70206/?

HD Khajiit Mouth (BETA right now)
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70867/?
author: Blackwolf24
